name: Split Reality (studiokaboom)
description:
Description:

Split Reality is a 3D platforming prototype incorporating some basic combat mechanics. The player finds themselves in a unknown world and will attempt to reach the end of the level with various obstacles in the way such as moving platforms, boiling acid and strange creatures!

Development Team:

Corey Schmid - Game Designer

Griffin Struhs - Game Artist

Justin Carter - Studio Director

Ann Stevens - Producer

Unity Assets:

. 3D Game Kit (https://unity3d.com/learn/tutorials/s/3d-game-kit)

. zz Ruler (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/zz-ruler-365)

Music: 

. bongos revenge (https://modarchive.org/index.php?request=view_by_moduleid&query=37946)

Story: 

The story of  Split Reality is about the main character who isn’t living the best life, their depressed, doesn’t have a job, goals or friends and they sits around at home doing nothing all due to his lack of confidence. She falls asleep only to be transported into a different world which holds a drastically different art style with bright colours and cute appearance. She finds out that an evil warlock has stolen her soul! The player is tasked with retrieving their soul back from the warlock allowing them to return their home world. 

(However, our main goal for the prototype is to display the gameplay mechanics and overall style.)
